sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { actSeenStudent, actUpdateStudent } from '../redux/actions' export default function Student(props) { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { student, stt } = props const handleSubmit = (student, action) => { if (action === 'seen') { dispatch(actSeenStudent({ student: student, action: 'SEEN' })) } if (action === 'update') { dispatch(actSeenStudent({ student: student, action: 'UPDATE'})) } } return ( {stt} {student.id} {student.name} {student.age} {student.gender ? "Nam" : "Nữ"}
) }
